attributes.action: intervene in the proposed closure of Fenny Compton Fire Station and ensure that it remains open to serve the local community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of the cuts proposed by Warwickshire Fire and Rescue in Sept 09 7 retained fire stations are due to be closed. This move will be ratified by the local Tory council unless it is opposed. Fenny Compton is the most southerly fire station in Warwickshire and if the closure goes through a big hole will be left to be covered by further afield fire stations including maybe some over border fire stations.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "intervene in the proposed closure of Fenny Compton Fire Station and ensure that it remains open to serve the local community."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22276


Prime Minister's Office
